Message: Sorry to hear that. Let me see how I can help you. How long has the fever >38.5 been present (Please enter 'no fever' if not existing condition)
Does your child have loose stools (Diarrhea) during this illness?
Does your child have or had Abdominal Pain during this illness?
Does your child have a rash which is all over the body?
Does the child have Itchy Rash?
Does the child have swollen hands and legs?
Does the child have Red eyes with or without sticky secretion?
Is the child very tired and more sleepy than usual?
Is the child confused or has been confused during this illness?
